```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
# library(texreg)

# Load workspace from analysis
load("saved/analysis.Rdata")

# Ensure export directories exist
dir.create("exports/figures", recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)
dir.create("exports/tables", recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)
```

# Purpose

This document exports all figures and tables from the analysis workspace
to the `exports/` directory in formats ready for Overleaf import:

- **Figures:** PNG (300 dpi) + PDF to `exports/figures/`
- **Tables:** LaTeX code to `exports/tables/`

After rendering, copy the `exports/` folder to your Overleaf project.

# Manifest

```{r}
#| label: manifest

cat("Exported figures:\n")
list.files("exports/figures", full.names = TRUE)

cat("\nExported tables:\n")
list.files("exports/tables", full.names = TRUE)
```
